name: TAKE THE GEMS
description:
Group: HELP
This game was inspired from cat mario.A fun chill game
Spacebar to jump
A D to walk
LeftShift to run
This game is a dedicated project for the Bangkok University GI344 class.
Supervised by
Ravisr Manomaivibul  
Nonthi Sithikong 
Samitta Somwong 
Chayapol Khodkham
Made by
Aiki Okita ( 329A )  Programmer/Game Designer
Jidapa Sansatien (329B)  Programmer/Graphic
Jakrapop Timpitak ( 329A )  Programmer/Game Designer/Game Tester
Poonsup Pikulklin ( 329A )  Programmer/Artist/Sound
Pooncharat Patsen ( 329J )  Programmer/Game Tester

piece of wood - clip art
